segments.text: This kitchen scene feels a bit melancholic to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flowing endlessly from the tap, no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle growing, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, stretching high for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool doesn't look stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and cry, poor kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting patiently, her little hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think it's fun, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside makes the inside seem even sadder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
